name: A friendly place
description:
A small game about helping someone reconnect to their friend. Meet characters, explore a dungeon, and fight monsters in this small game.

Made for Lowrezjam 2022. The end of the jam was difficult for me, so the game might feel a bit unfinished. (no music, story is not as good as i wanted).

Controls:

Exploration

  • Direction key: move
  • M: open menu

Battle

  • left, down, right key: use skills
  • P: pause

Also playable with a gamepad.
